name: Trafalgar Tours
overview:
Operating since 1947, Trafalgar is now the world’s favourite touring company. Offering a wide range of holidays to Europe, Britain, Egypt, USA, Canada, South America, China, Australia and New Zealand, weâ€™ve hosted over 2 million travellers worldwide and many return year after year.

Trafalgar is renowned and trusted for its outstanding quality, service, reliability and financial stability. With over 60 years of practice weâ€™ve perfected the art of creating exceptional escorted holidays. Every expertly designed travel experience includes transportation, via deluxe motor coach, rail or cruise ship, first class hotel accommodation, daily sightseeing and most meals and at at savings of up to 30% off the cost of doing it “on your own”.

Trafalgar continuously strives to fulfill our guests’ needs and exceed their expectations â€“ attention to detail ensures you will enjoy a totally hassle-free holiday. We provide the perfect balance between organised activities and free time for individual exploration and relaxation â€“ all you have to do is Dream. Pack. And leave… the rest to us.
